org.jvirtanen.parity.top

Interface MarketListener


  • public interface MarketListener
    The interface for outbound events from the order book reconstruction.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void bbo(long instrument, long bidPrice, long bidSize, long askPrice, long askSize)
      An event indicating that the best bid and offer (BBO) has changed.
      void trade(long instrument, Side side, long price, long size)
      An event indicating that a trade has taken place.

    • Method Detail

      • bbo

        void bbo(long instrument,
         long bidPrice,
         long bidSize,
         long askPrice,
         long askSize)
        An event indicating that the best bid and offer (BBO) has changed.
        Parameters:
        instrument - the instrument
        bidPrice - the bid price or zero if there are no bids
        bidSize - the bid size or zero if there are no bids
        askPrice - the ask price or zero if there are no asks
        askSize - the ask size or zero if there are no asks

      • trade

        void trade(long instrument,
           Side side,
           long price,
           long size)
        An event indicating that a trade has taken place.
        Parameters:
        instrument - the instrument
        side - the side of the resting order
        price - the trade price
        size - the trade size
